C#","$invalid":false,"settings":{"headers":{},"method":"GET","uri":"https://murilo-take-challenge.herokuapp.com/repositories/takenet/c%23?sort=asc&qty=5","responseBodyVariable":"res"},"conditions":[]},{"$id":"cfb06289-24d5-4c23-beef-5e917da26449","$typeOfContent":"","type":"ExecuteScript","$title":"Executar script","$invalid":false,"settings":{"function":"run","source":"/**
* All input variables needs to be passed as function param;
* Objects received as param needs to be parsed. Ex.: JSON.parse(inputVariable1);
* Objects returned needs to be stringfied. Ex.: JSON.stringify(inputVariable1);
**/
function run(res) {
  const res = JSON.parse(res);
  const itemBuilder = (name, img, description, url) => (
    {
      "header": {
        "type": "application/vnd.lime.media-link+json",
        "value": {
          "title": name,
          "text": description,
          "type": "image/jpeg",
          "aspectRatio": "2:1",
          "uri": img
        }
      },
      "options": [
        {
          "label": {
            "type": "application/vnd.lime.web-link+json",
            "value": {
              "title": "Acessar",
              "uri": url
            }
          }
        },
      ]
    }
  )


  const obj = {
    "itemType": "application/vnd.lime.document-select+json",
    "items": []
  }

  res.forEach(({ name, img, description, url }) => {
    obj.items.push(itemBuilder(name, img, description, url));
  })

  return JSON.stringify(obj);
}","inputVariables":["context.res"],"outputVariable":"retorno","LocalTimeZoneEnabled":false},"conditions":[]}],"$leavingCustomActions":[],"$inputSuggestions":[],"$defaultOutput":{"stateId":"fallback","$invalid":false},"$tags":[],"id":"058fcd63-0fd6-4690-8871-5bbca5daaffb","root":false,"$title":"Desafio","$position":{"top":"416.238px","left":"689.476px"},"$invalidContentActions":false,"$invalidOutputs":false,"$invalidCustomActions":false,"$invalid":false}}
